ygData.subject: RE: PGT vs. Barbed Leather Whip....
ygData.msgSnippet: About 3 weeks ago I bought a Barbed Leather Whip for 35pp - good deal - guy was asking 50pp but I guess he wanted the cash.┬á I like it a lot!┬á Usually have
ygData.messageBody:
About 3 weeks ago I bought a Barbed Leather Whip for 35pp - good deal - guy
was asking 50pp but I guess he wanted the cash.´┐¢ I like it a lot!´┐¢ Usually
have it in my primary - so it snaps each round and a dirk in my off hand.
Sometimes I have BLW in off hand and Ashenwood Short Stabber in primary.´┐¢
But for serious action I go with the Ash stabber and Dirk.
´┐¢
Last night, I traded a Shiney Brass Halbred and 150pp for a PGT and this was
right in HighHold Pass.´┐¢ I guess I really wanted that Polish Garnet
Tommychopper!!!
´┐¢
Are the stats worth 200pp?´┐¢
´┐¢
Barb Leather Whip 50pp
´┐¢
PGT 250pp
´┐¢
The look alone... "Priceless!"
´┐¢
Anyone on Innoruuk want to trade their Staff of Writhing (and some plat) for
a Glowing Stein?
´┐¢
Shield of the Slain Unicorn, anyone? I got a line on one at a great price
and NO - no we did NOT kill or hurt any unicorns to get this.
´┐¢
Sylly Songsynger
Selling Swords and Such
Somewhere on Innoruuk
´┐¢
p.s. we did a corpse recovery in Paw last night - actually took two nights.´┐¢
In the end Rilla (guide) had to drag it out from under some terrain.´┐¢ I
looked at her stuffs - with her permission of course -- and will be posting
some screen shots - talk about twinked!!!!´┐¢ She had some really cool rares.

-----Original Message-----
From: Sean Gifford [mailto:Giffords@...]
Sent: Monday, August 16, 1999 4:09 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] PGT vs. Barbed Leather Whip....


I know this has been gone over already, but since now that I am getting
close to the affording range I would like some more Info on it.´┐¢ My stats
right now are: 104 strength (big improvement over 85 eh?) 94 agility,
111dex, 90 charisma, 80 int, 60 wisdom.
´┐¢´┐¢´┐¢ Because I am moving onto mobs that carry pricier loot and I in turn am
racking up more cash I have to wonder once again, which is better for me?
The Polished Granite Tomahawk, or the Barbed Leather whip?´┐¢ I have asked a
number of high level bards on my server, and have gotten conflicting
answers...´┐¢ I have been leaning over to the Barbed Leather whip side of
things, but because I have a pretty good dex I was wondering if maybe
because I would proc more on the PGT, the tommy would be a better choice.´┐¢ I
have got about 80pp in the bank right now, but I have started working on
Lake Rathe and Permafrost, and have been getting sizable donations for
healing and Taxi rides, as well as Teaching Elder dragon, and a friend of
mine and I are starting a heavy duty jewelering biz, so My new fortune is
not far off.
´┐¢
Thank you for all your help, and please don't over reply to this... I would
hate to start a Giant thread.
´┐¢
Gleeman, Bard of the 17th Level - Karana
Long Live the Star Gazers!
p.s. A guildmate of mine gave me the BI crown he looted off a Goblin Warlord
for trade for my Bronze helm!´┐¢ I nearly pissed myself when he offered the
trade...
